name: knowzcode (Dev Build)
description: Lean orchestrator for Claude Code bringing together spec-driven development, subagents with context management, and personal knowledge store for a superior vibe coding experience
author: Alex Headscarf

commands.name: /k:init
commands.description: Initialize Knowz project structure in current repository

commands.name: /k:work
commands.description: Start a new WorkGroup with a defined goal

commands.name: /k:spec
commands.description: Draft and refine specifications for the current WorkGroup

commands.name: /k:plan
commands.description: Create execution plan with parallelizable task cycles

commands.name: /k:execute
commands.description: Execute planned tasks using parallel subagent cycles

commands.name: /k:audit
commands.description: Perform completeness audit on implemented changes

commands.name: /k:finalize
commands.description: Update as-built specifications and commit changes

commands.name: /k:continue
commands.description: Resume work from saved WorkGroup state

commands.name: /k:scan
commands.description: Perform brownfield codebase analysis generating 7 documents

commands.name: /k:fix
commands.description: Quick micro-fix for single-file or small changes

commands.name: /k:mcp
commands.description: Manual MCP delegation command for isolated MCP operations

agents.name: k-orchestrator

agents.name: k-spec-chief
agents.description: Design phase agent for specification generation

agents.name: k-arc-auditor
agents.description: Check phase agent for completeness audit (READ-ONLY)

agents.description: Dependency analysis and parallel execution planning agent
